fields.name: conversationId
fields.comment: REQUIRED. The Conversation Id of the current business process.

fields.name: acceptLanguage
fields.comment: The language of the translatable properties. Available values : de, fr, it, en

fields.name: scrollContext
fields.comment: Based on a previous search-response, earlier or later connections for the same trip can be retrieved by scrolling back and forward (by a pointer-context). You must use the same GET request parameters as in the previous trips-request. Additionally either of the given values in the previous response-header for "Scrollback-Context" or "Scrollforward-Context" can be set for "Scroll-Context" to force optional scrolling. Example : 2%7COF%7CMT%C2%B511%C2%B5431359%C2%B5431359%C2%B5431662%C2%B5431662%C2%B50%C2%B50%C2%B5485%C2%B5431330%C2%B55%C2%B5-2147483630%C2%B50%C2%B51%C2%B52%7CPDH%C2%B577a7e8108112554ba5d46aeba769461f%7CRD%C2%B57102020%7CRT%C2%B5114900%7CUS%C2%B50
